synonyms: āpana-uddhāra—his personal deliverance; ei raghunātha-dāsa—this Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; gaurāṅga-stava-kalpa-vṛkṣe—in his poem known as Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa; kariyāchena prakāśa—has manifested.
translation: In his own poem known as the Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa, Raghunātha dāsa has described his personal deliverance.
